name: Judgement Bay Demake
description:
~ Announcement ~

I have a bigger game coming soon! :D

~Instructions ~

Wait for the splash screen to disappear, and use your mouse to draw something on each side. When you're done, press space. And the islanders will vote on which one they like the most! :D 

Made with Java and LibGDX.

All music belongs to Nintendo, and the cheering sound effect was from YouTube.
